content.text: Match ends, Granada CF 1, Valencia 2.
Second Half ends, Granada CF 1, Valencia 2.
Attempt saved. Tino Costa (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Nélson Haedo Valdez.
Roberto Soldado (Valencia) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Nélson Haedo Valdez following a fast break.
Attempt saved. Tino Costa (Valencia) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nélson Haedo Valdez.
